    namespace :deploy do

    desc "Start a deployment, make sure server(s) ready."
task :starting do
end

desc "Started"
task :started do
end

desc "Update server(s) by setting up a new release."
task :updating do
end

desc "Updated"
task :updated do
end

desc "Revert server(s) to previous release."
task :reverting do
end

desc "Reverted"
task :reverted do
end

desc "Publish the release."
task :publishing do
end

desc "Published"
task :published do
end

desc "Finish the deployment, clean up server(s)."
task :finishing do
end

desc "Finish the rollback, clean up server(s)."
task :finishing_rollback do
end

desc "Finished"
task :finished do
end

desc "Rollback to previous release."
task :rollback do
  %w{ starting started
      reverting reverted
      publishing published
      finishing_rollback finished }.each do |task|
    invoke "deploy:#{task}"
  end
end

    end

    desc “Deploy a new release.” task :deploy do

    set(:deploying, true)
%w{ starting started
    updating updated
    publishing published
    finishing finished }.each do |task|
  invoke "deploy:#{task}"
end

    end task default: :deploy
